name: Borderlands 2
description: Installs the windows version of borderlands 2 with D9VK 0.12
notes:
Rename Boderlands2.exe to Launcher.exe

Don't set physx to high or you may experience crashing
content:
files:
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.11/d9vk-0.11.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 49520
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.12
    src: d9vk
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.12
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
